snippet: Jane Kim’s recently completed work for the Cornell Lab of Ornithology spans 70 by 40 feet and depicts every modern bird family (and some dinosaurs, too).
lead_paragraph: Jane Kim’s recently completed work for the Cornell Lab of Ornithology spans 70 by 40 feet and depicts every modern bird family (and some dinosaurs, too).

headline.main: 270 Kinds of Birds, in One Gigantic Life-Sized Mural
